attributes.action: Reduce the cost of fuel petrol / diesel
attributes.additional_details:
The cost of motoring in the current age is forcing people off the road.

A car is becoming a luxury that only the rich can afford.

and yet each few months we're subjected to the likes of BP, Shell etc release massive profits of billions of pounds or dollars.

The motorist is a cash pot and in a short space of time the cost of petrol has doubled and it's drastically destroying peoples lives, jobs and companies.
